CustomField.description: Activates or deactivates this trigger feature. Uncheck to disable the business logic without deleting the configuration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the associated trigger handler will execute during the specified trigger events. Use this to temporarily disable features (e.g., during data migrations) while retaining their configuration. Best Practice: Deactivate instead of deleting to preserve historical metadata.
CustomField.label: Is Active
